name: Hammer & Anvil VR
description: Become the blacksmith of the village! Forge axes, dagues, spikes, shields and sword from iron sticks and other base materials.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX-8350 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX Vega 64 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
